titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Ford Foundation records, Central Index FA1660

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-03-13 18:03:25 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

physdesc.extent: Including but not limited to: 10,779 microfilm reels

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Records more than 10 years old are open for research, unless otherwise noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: From the 1950s-1980s the Central Files included the Grants, General Correspondence, Projects, and Log Files. The Central Files were then indexed by the Central Index, and routing of documents was controlled by the Action Control Slips.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Organized in collections by file type: Grants, General Correspondence, Projects, Log Files, Action Control Slips and the Central Index.
